main event: A ground-sighted red object, the size of a football, was observed drifting erratically in Plymouth, New Hampshire.
interesting points: The object was observed for a total of 1 hour and 35 minutes, moving several feet side to side,At times the object winked out and then reappeared several times,The sighting occurred at night with clear skies,There was speculation that the object was actually Mars,The object was described as bright red and having no unusual features.
sighted object: one bright red object the size of a football
witness description: One officer on duty, a school teacher, and a housewife.
